name: WPC Multiple External Product URLs for WooCommerce
author: WPClever

sections.description:
External or affiliate products are ones that have been linked to other sites or platforms other than WooCommerce. With the WPC Multiple External Product URLs plugin, you are empowered with the ability to create multiple external / affiliate product URLs for any product and variation.

Live demo

Visit our live demo here to see how this plugin works.

Features

  • Can add unlimited external product URLs
  • Display URLs in multiple positions on a single product and product archive
  • Use shortcode [wpcme] to place external URLs anywhere
  • Customize button text for each external URL
  • Choose to open the link in the same tab or a new tab
  • Compatible with popular WordPress themes and Woo plugins/add-ons

Need more features?

Please try other plugins from us:

  • WPC External Variations
  • WPC Product Options for WooCommerce
sections.installation:
1. Please make sure that you installed WooCommerce
  2. Go to plugins in your dashboard and select “Add New”
  3. Search for “WPC Multiple External Product URLs”, Install & Activate it
  4. Go to WPClever > External URLs to change settings
